theextravagant:PlaceholderRelic2.NAME: Placeholder Relic 2
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each combat, gain #b1 #yStrength.

theextravagant:DefaultClickableRelic.NAME: Right-Clicky Relic
theextravagant:DefaultClickableRelic.FLAVOR: The more you right-click it, the more orbs you've evoked in your lifetime.

theextravagant:BottledPlaceholderRelic.NAME: Bottled Placeholder
DESCRIPTIONS: Choose a card. Whenever you take play any card, draw the chosen card.
Whenever you play a card, draw
Select a card to bottle for

theextravagant:TranslucentFeather.NAME: Translucent Feather
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each combat #yFetch #b1 card from your draw pile.

theextravagant:TranscendedFeather.NAME: Transcended Feather
DESCRIPTIONS: Replaces Translucent Feather. At the start of each combat add #b2 #ytheextravagant:Invocations to your hand.

theextravagant:RedPhonoblaster.NAME: Red Phonoblaster
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you gain #yStrength, gain #b1 additional #yStrength and lose #b1 Strength at the end of your turn.

theextravagant:Sorbet.NAME: Sorbet
theextravagant:Sorbet.FLAVOR: Like Ice cream, but made for fancy people.
DESCRIPTIONS: Extravagance is now conserved between turns.

theextravagant:PocketDynamo.NAME: Pocket Dynamo
theextravagant:PocketDynamo.FLAVOR: If you spin it enough, a small light flickers.
DESCRIPTIONS: If your hand is empty at the end of your turn, add #b1 #ytheextravagant:Accumulation to your hand.

theextravagant:MoltenLipstick.NAME: Molten Lipstick
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you play a card that  costs #b0 [E], deal #b10 damage to a random enemy and add an upgraded #yBurn on top of your draw pile.
